gameDetails.name: Penny Papers Adventures: The Temple of Apikhabou â€“ Santa's Secret Lair
gameDetails.description:
Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo for Day 20.

Something terrible is happening in North Pole: All the cute elves of Christmas have been turned into dangerous zombies!
Penny Papers has been called by Santa Claus to secure his famous hidden factory. In return, she will have the right to keep a few presents to bring back home.

This new map is to be played with the "The Temple of Apikhabou" box. Rules of the game remains the same, with different modifications.
